newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgium to finish budget review before Easter.
newsitem.headline: Belgium to finish budget review before Easter.

text.p: The Belgian government will finish the review of its 1997 budget and the mid-term update of its policy programme in the week before Easter, Belgian Prime Minister Jean-Luc Dehaene said on Friday.
"We have to finish the budget review in order to be able to present it to parliament before the end of April, as the law requires," Dehaene told a news conference after the weekly cabinet meeting.
Dehaene had previously said the budget review would be done by mid-March. Easter is on March 30.
